browserTarget.description: Browser target to be run. Usually the Angular app.

ssrTarget.description: Server side rendering target to be run. Usually the Angular Universal target

serveTarget.description: Server target to be run. Usually the NestJS app.

host.description: Host to publish the application auto reloaded by browser sync

openBrowser.description: True if a browser tab should be opened upon app startup

sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

browsers.description: Specify which browsers to open. (Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari)

serverAutoSync.description: Disable auto sync if you want to deal with triggering browsersync refresh yourself. This setting will only affect changes in the server app. Use triggerReload() function to trigger browsersync refresh.
